name: Deathwish (Peterino, TechiXD)
description:
Some say it's the dark souls of shooters.

Tactical speedrunning FPS. Click on heads, move fast. 

Video settings are available in the menu (ESC)

_____________________________________________________________________

CONTROLS

WASD to Move

Left Click to Shoot

Right Click to ADS

Space to Jump

Ctrl to Crouch/Slide

Alt to Slide

Shift to Sprint

Q for Stun Grenade

B to Buy

_____________________________________________________________________

CREDITS

Peterino - Programming/Game Design

TechiXD - Level Design/Game Design

Chris - 3D Art/Level Design

Mike - Sound Design/Composer
